
# Overview {.unnumbered}

This is the course laboratory manual for **PUB609 Water Quality II** in the School of Occupational and Public Health, Toronto Metropolitan University. This e-book was prepared using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/books/) in [RStudio (Posit)](https://posit.co/).
